This is a very interesting leisure origami game, which can exercise your hands-on ability~
In the game, you must fold the paper into the specified cute figure as much as possible in the specified origami level
The game is challenging from simple to difficult
New 80 levels waiting for your challenge~

Beautiful girl + changing clothes + Origami

Each role has its own dynamic CG

Interesting origami, time to show your wisdom
